title: How the Assault on Iran Unfolded
summary_full: Despite warnings after an earlier wave of killings, top Iranian officials gathered in person, and Israel seized the chance to kill Iran’s supreme leader.
summary_public: Despite warnings after an earlier wave of killings, top Iranian officials gathered in person, and Israel seized the chance to kill Iran’s supreme leader.

IL.label: negative
IL.evidence: Israel seized the chance to kill Iran’s supreme leader
